document.full_text: moody's investors service said it may downgrade the debt ratings of bank of america corp, citigroup inc and wells fargo & co, citing concerns about waning u.s. political willingness to offer support for the largest banks.
document.title: moody's may cut bofa, citi, wells ratings
lines_and_colors: moody's investors service said it may downgrade the debt ratings of bank of america corp, citigroup inc and wells fargo & co, citing concerns about waning u.s. political willingness to offer support for the largest banks.
